"Eradicate Aim - IV":
"You are probably aware that the D-Arkers are on a
rampage at the mining base of the Planet Lillipur.
Although it has been said that new species have
appeared, the things to do remain unchanged.
As always, go forth and eradicate all of them.
It is because it is you, and you can be depended upon.

*Target Solsa Burada"
"エラディケート・エイム・Ⅳ"

"惑星リリーパの採掘基地でダーカーが
暴れているのは知ってるだろ。
新種が出たって話だけど
やることは変わらない。
いつも通り、根こそぎ退治してきてよ。
あんたなら任せられるからね。

※ソルザ・ブラーダが対象"
